Colophon





This website was coded from scratch by Ernest Strauhal.

Adobe Caslon is the main typeface for this website and was designed by Carol Twombly.

The globe that I use in the background was made by Edan Kwan.

This website is hosted on Github pages and consists of .html, .css, and .js files.

ALSO CHECK OUT MY YOUTUBE PLAYLIST OF ALL THE VIDEOS I FOUND WHILE RESEARCHING FOR THIS PROJECT
